episodes.title: Episode 22:  "Cults & Fascism - Finding the way out" w/ Dr. Hassan & Dr. Wilson. Is there a cure?
episodes.description:
June 6 - Title:  "Cults & Fascism - Finding the way out."
Season 5 | Episode 22  (Show 214)
DOCTOR DOCTOR GIVE US THE NEWS

ABOUT THE FRIDAY POWER LUNCH
The Friday Power Lunch (now in its 5th Season) is a weekly video podcast produced by the unstoppable women of Network NOVA to amplify the voices of the grassroots on politics, culture and women making change. The show is recorded before a live Zoom audience every Friday from 12-1pm ET and consists of 2-3 interview segments. Our segments are informal conversations before a friendly audience.

Register: FridayPowerLunch.com
Subscribe to our Substack: https://fridaypowerlunch.substack.com

========== 
CREDITS: 
Show Hosts: Katherine White, Finale Norton & Carrie Short

Community Builder: Michelle McKinney
Wordsmiths: Kristin Battista-Frazee

The Friday Power Lunch is a weekly video podcast produced by the badass women of Network NOVA to amplify the voices of the Grassroots on politics, culture, and people making change. https://networknova.org. 

To get tickets to the live show, go to https://fridaypowerlunch.com
Follow us on Substack: https://fridaypowerlunch.substack.com/
Website: https://networknova.org/live/
